meanings.sent1: The aidless child struggled to carry the heavy books home.
meanings.sent2: The aidless traveler had to navigate the unfamiliar city alone.
meanings.sent3: The aidless puppy tried to reach its toy on the high shelf.
meanings.sent4: The aidless plant withered without water or sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aidless student faced the challenging exam without any help.

meanings.sent1: She walked aidlessly through the dark forest, relying only on her flashlight.
meanings.sent2: The injured hiker moved aidlessly down the steep slope.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed aidlessly at the closed door, wanting to go outside.
meanings.sent4: The lost child wandered aidlessly in the crowded mall, searching for his mother.
meanings.sent5: The musician played aidlessly, without any sheet music to guide him.
